Hi, i'm new here, and i've loved gladiator since I first got the 
demo, but recently i've lost my CD and i can't find the game 
anywhere.  I'm hoping someone could e-mail it to me or tell me of a 
working version.  i've already tried OPENGLAD-0.98 but it doesn't 
work.  In short i've tried everywhere but can't find it.  plz help 
me if you can.
